pages.text: A toggleable sigil that mends your equipment over time. While active, damaged items in your inventory slowly repair themselves at the cost of LP.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Toggle:$() Right-click to activate/deactivate$(br)$(bold)LP Cost:$() Configurable per durability point$(br)$(bold)Scope:$() All inventory slots, armor, and offhand$(br2)The sigil periodically scans for damaged items and repairs them. It will deactivate if you run out of LP.

pages.title: Limitations
pages.text: $(bold)Blacklist:$() Items tagged with $(thing)animus:disallow_repair$() cannot be repaired by this sigil.$(br2)$(bold)Repair Rate:$() Configurable repair amount per interval.$(br2)$(italic)Blood mends what time breaks.$()
